## lin\_sRGB\_to\_XYZ() function

Convert an array of linear-light sRGB values to CIE XYZ using sRGB's own white, D65 (no chromatic adaptation)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function lin_sRGB_to_XYZ(rgb: Color): Color;
```
